comments.body: We should reintroduce this as a deprecated `type` alias to `scala.scalanative.reflect.annotation.EnableReflectiveInstantation`. That will help users who were cross-compiling with the help of this class to notice that they must add `scala.scalanative.reflect.annotation.EnableReflectiveInstantiation` for their code to still correctly behave.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,11 +0,0 @@
-package scala.scalajs.reflect.annotation
-
-// Ported from Scala JS
-
-/** Enables reflective instantiation for the annotated class, trait or object,
- *  and all its descendants.
- *
- *  Affected classes can be identified at run-time through methods of
- *  [[scala.scalajs.reflect.Reflect]].
- */
-class EnableReflectiveInstantiation extends scala.annotation.StaticAnnotation
